articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT dhai.eth 🤠 📍 🇮🇩
Sneha is one of the few ppl who have contributed so much to D_D without even being a member. She's already set up multiple events including a new initiative @DDbuidlIRL. So happy that she's a member now!
@developer_dao gang show her some love! ❤️
Sneha Mishra 💜 (🛠️, 🌈 ) 🏴‍☠️: ✨Developer DAO Appreciation Tweet✨
Thanks to the entire @developer_dao team and @dhaiwat10 for this beaut airdropped to my wallet🙈
Y'all makin me cry💜🥹
Super excited for the upcoming initiatives @DDbuidlIRL 🚀

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Cami @ KBW 🇰🇷
Giving a talk today at eth seoul on building dapps in ~1.5 hours 🤩 
We’ll cover:
- architecture
- defining your tech stack 
- how all the protocols communicate with each other 
Livestream it here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q9-5KRmC2O8
